utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, guys, listen, don't forget that tomorrow is the day that Emily gets married again, so whatever we do, just try to really keep Ross's mind off of it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, good idea.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey man, what's up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, eh, just thinking about Emily getting married tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, Ross, look! Look!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? Where?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Right over there! Right there! Look-look-look!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What am I looking at?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Somebody help me out here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: How are you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Monica, I'm sorry I didn't come by last night. I was out with Gary; he let me ride around with him in his cop car. We saw and prevented crimes.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You got to go on a ride along?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I want to go on a ride along!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah! Me too!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Really?! You?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Well, it's kinda dangerous.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, I like danger.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay, you guys free tonight?

utterance.speaker: Joey and Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Tonight? You-you didn't say it was going to be at nighttime.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! Oh, I'm so glad you're home, I thought tonight we could finally organize these photos!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, thank God! Finally!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, I've broken them down into categories. Okay, we have uh, we got holidays, birthdays, candids, y'know… And then what I've done is I've cross-referenced them by subject. Right? So if you're looking up, oh let's say birthdays and dogs, you get Photo 152. See?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, it's me and La Poo! Wow! I miss that dog.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You can also find him under umm, dog and dead.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Great! Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, hand me that other box of photos; that's the very last one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oops. Sorry! Well, good thing you number all of them, huh?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I hadn't! Photo 152 was a prototype.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohhhh. Honey, honey, honey, it's okay, it's okay honey. I'm gonna fix you a drink, huh? Maybe a margarita?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ross has the blender! Ugh, everything's just falling apart!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No honey, it's okay! Listen, I'll got to Ross's and get the blender, you get all the margarita stuff ready.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, he's keys are in the drawer. Y'know what? I also need some cash.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, you want me to stop at the ATM?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nah, while you're at Ross's if you see any lying around…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! I-I-I don't, I don't do that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That was so cool man, the way you leaned on that guy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It is starting to get dark out there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He told you everything! I mean you totally cracked him!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Yeah well, being that he was the victim, they're usually pretty talkative.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay. But it is officially nighttime.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hey, Gary, want me to grab the berry for ya?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: It's called the cherry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's the—Chandler!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, I got it! This place makes the best sandwich in the world!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey Joe does it have meatballs on it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-ho, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Does it have melted cheese and marinara sauce?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yep!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Yeah, you can't eat that in my car.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah okay. Even though my tax dollars paid for this car.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Your tax dollars?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! That sandwich really does smell good.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Did I say you could smell it?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't smell your sandwich?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Half the taste is in the smell! You-you're sucking up all the tastiness!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I'll give them back. Look! What is so great about that sandwich?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, imagine the best sex you've ever had.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you thinking about Monica?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, what's that like?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh please don't be from a real dinosaur! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Please! Made in Mexico! Yes!! Ugh, who would buy this?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Rach! It's me! Pick up!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! What's up?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I need a few more things to make the margaritas. Uhh, I need some salt, some margarita mix, and tequila.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So all we have is ice?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: See if he has ice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Hello Ross? It's Emily. I know this is out of the blue but uh, I'm getting married tomorrow. Well, maybe I am. I keep thinking about you and I'm wondering if-if we made a mistake giving up so fast. Are you thinking about me? Of course you're not, but if you are, call me tonight. Okay, bye.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh. Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So where are we going next?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: This witness won't return my calls so we're gonna see if we can surprise him coming home.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sur-surprise him? We're not, we're not gonna make anybody mad are we?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on man! Listen so uh, are you gonna squeeze the perps shoes a little bit before he lawyers up?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: It's a witness not a perp. And no one talks like that!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, no one talks like that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh what? Like your Mr. Cop!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I'm more cop than you two!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How do you figure that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hello! I'm in the front seat, okay? I'm Gary's partner!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y'know, when you say partner it doesn't sound cop. It, it sounds gay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, jealous!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey, do you mind? We're under cover here.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, no problem.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sorry! Sorry! Oh, there! Hey Gary, who am I? Phone home!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look at Officer Ross riding back here with the visitors.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, what's up with that Serpico?

utterance.speaker: Emily
utterance.content: Are you thinking about me? Of course you're not, but if you are, call me tonight. Okay, bye.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nooo!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well thank God you were here! I mean, we have to erase that!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! We can't do that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We have too! I mean what if Ross's hears that and then calls her back and then they get back together? Is that what you want? Ross back with that controlling, neurotic, crazy Emily? The Emily that wouldn't let him see you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noo! Oh no! No! God no! He should not get back together with her. I know that! You know that! Even Ross knows that! But that still doesn’t give us the right to erase his message!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm his sister, okay? I love him! I don't want to see him get hurt! Come on! Doesn’t that give me the right to control him—help him?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I don't think he's the one who needs help.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, look, she's obviously unstable, okay? I mean she's thinking about running out on her wedding day. Okay, fine! But I mean, look at the position she's putting him in! What's he gonna do? Ross is gonna run over there on the wedding day and break up the marriage?! I mean, who would do that?! Okay, fine, all right, but that's y'know, it's different! Although it did involve a lot of the same people.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y'know what, this is obviously some kind of twisted joke she's trying to play on him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, you are crazy! I'm sorry, but she sounded generally upset! I mean, listen!

utterance.speaker: Answering Machine
utterance.content: Your messages have been erased.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noooooooo!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, y'know, we-we're safe right? I mean nothing bad can go down!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: No. But that reminds me, sign this.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What is it?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Oh it's nothing, it just says that you can't sue the city if you scrap your knee or y'know, get your head blown off.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, hurry up. I want to sign that.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay, here he comes. What is he doing? What the hell is he doing?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? What? What? What is it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is everything okay?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay, he sees us. Now don't move. Don't look at him.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey, it's okay. It was just a car backfire. Hey, look at that! You tried to save your buddy. You see that? You see what he did?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You okay man?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Thank Joey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Uh, HELLO!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I guess we should go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, wait. Wait.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh yeah right!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, Monica! Monica! We have to fix this!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There's nothing we can do. You erased the message!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah well unless we tell him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, if you're gonna be totally rational about this, I can't argue with you! All right? Fine, if you wanna tell him, tell him. I just don't want to be a part of it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, maybe that's Emily calling back to leave the exact same message.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Ross! It's you! I just want you to remember this feeling. You are lucky to be alive! So live everyday to the fullest. Love yourself, okay? Okay. Oh, and also get stamps. Bye!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! Play that message for Emily and this whole problem goes away!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right?

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey, anybody want to meet a hero?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: John Glenn is here?!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: No, Joey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs, we had the most incredible night! Okay, so, we're in the car…

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Wait! Hold on! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Okay, go ahead.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, so we're in the car. Right? And bang! A shot was fired. And Joey with no regard for his own safety throws himself on me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: My God, Joey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: It was a car backfire!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, but-but he didn't know that!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I didn't know that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And it could've just as easily have been a bullet.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Hey Joe, you ever think about joining the force? We could use a guy like you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who jumps at loud noises!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! I could've died tonight.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! If the car that backfired had run over you! Y'know what, I think I'll go home before Ross starts rambling about his newfound respect for life.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I do have a newfound respect for life.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: So you wanna get some dinner?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Sure! Yep! Oh, y'know what? If I heard a shot right now, I'd throw my body on you.

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: Oh yeah? Well maybe you and I should take a walk through a bad neighborhood.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Gary
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Ross and Joey
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Cut it out Ross! I hate to have to save your life and kick your ass in the same day!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude! How come you took off?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I just went for a walk, around the living room. Whatever…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Is something wrong?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. No I'm just tired. Y'know, from-from the walk.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You dove in front of Ross! Ross!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's what this is about! Oh my God, you hate Ross!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I do not hate Ross!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Of course you do! I saved him! You're mad at me! It all adds up! You want Ross out of the picture.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What picture?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know, but I don't like what I'm hearing!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look I'm very glad that you saved Ross from the car backfire, but y'know, it could've been a bullet and you y'know, you didn't try to save me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh, you're upset because you think I chose Ross over you! No! I…knew…you could take care of yourself. Y'know, I mean Ross, he need help. He's not street like us!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: When it comes down to it, you would risk your life for Ross before you would for me. That's the bottom line.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, no, not exactly! All right, look, I, I wasn't trying to save Ross. Okay? My sandwich was next to Ross. All right? I was, I was trying to save my sandwich.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: From a bullet!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know it doesn't make much sense…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Much sense?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look Chandler, it was instinct! Okay? I just went for it!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you risked your life, for a sandwich!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know it sounds crazy, but Chandler this is the greatest sandwich in the world!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you didn't uh, choose Ross before me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! I would never do that! You-you're like my brother!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! In fact, to prove how much you mean to me, here.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, eh, oh-oi, easy, it's not a hot dog!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How good is that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh-oi-ho, yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hm-hmm.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh-whoa-hey, dude, what are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I thought you were showing me how much you mean to me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. With a bite! Gee-e-e-eez!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, what uh, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Y'know what? You are in our apartment all the time! Okay? This is, this is just a drop in the bucket mister!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know, it-it doesn't matter. The important thing is that you're here. You're my friend, and you're here. Oh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, just a little scared. What's going on Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: The most amazing thing happened tonight. I thought my number was up. I had an actual near death experience!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! What? What happened?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, we were on the ride along with Gary, right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And somebody took a shot at me!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, a car backfired, but I thought somebody was taking a shot at me. And Rach, I…I survived! And I was filled with this-this great respect for life. Y'know? I-I want to experience every moment. I want to seize every opportunity. I-I am seeing everything so-so clearly now.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Because a car backfired?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, why are you here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I-I-I don't know how this fits into your whole "seizing" thing but um, Emily called you today.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You talked to her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, she left a message. But it-it kinda got erased. There's just something wrong with your machine.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, okay, what-what did she say?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, uh something about having second thoughts about the wedding and did you guys make a mistake breaking up and uh, she wants you to call her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now, that-that was a good thing that I told you, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh? Yeah! Yes, of course!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. Thank you! Thank you! Because—I'm sorry, all right. Because y'know what? She didn't want me—not important. The point is, I was right. Your decision. Okay? I was right. Your decision.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right. I guess, I guess I should call Emily.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, no, that's not the right decision. That's not, that's not right, no Ross-Ross, come on! I mean, that woman made you miserable! Okay, Ross, do you really want to get back into that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, look, yesterday I would've even considered calling her back, but my ex-wife calls on the same day I have a near death experience. I mean, that-that has got to mean something!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, Ross! That was not a near death experience! That was barely an experience!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You weren't there! Okay, maybe this is something that I-I'm supposed to seize! Y'know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y'know what? Maybe, this is not about seizing stuff. Maybe this is about escaping stuff.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Huh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean, look-look today you escaped death, y'know? And maybe this is a chance for you to escape getting back together with Emily?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That does make sense. Because I do wanna seize some opportunity, but I-I really don't wanna see or talk to her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, there you go!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Maybe today is just, close call day.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Close call day.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, thanks Rach.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, honey no problem. Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh wait-wait-wait! The message is blinking. Maybe you didn't erase it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: "Hey Ross, it's you!" Oh yeah, no that's-that's an old message, nobody needs to hear that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey umm, was-was Monica here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I want my money back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, uh you-you probably need that for stamps, right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs, has Gary ever been shot at for real?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yes. Once. Yeah, a little. He kinda did it to himself. It's not really a good story.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I wonder how I would react under fire, y'know? And not backfire but-but heavy fire, like I was in a war or something.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Man, I would be great in a war! I mean, I really, I think I would make a fantastic military leader. I mean I know I would make General way before any of you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Before or after you were shot by your own troops?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know where Joey would be. He would be down in the foxhole protecting all of us.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, if the foxhole was lined with sandwiches.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, hero sandwiches.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well you all know that I'm a pacifist so I'm not interested in war in any way. But y'know what? When the revolution comes, I will have to destroy you all. Not you Joey.
